title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/tocP
author: Mario Pietsch
name: tocP
readme:
This plugin contains several "Table of Content" macros, that have the same parameters as the core toc macro. The main difference is, that it doesn't use tags to create the TOC scructure. It uses a "parent" field in so called "child - tiddlers". ''Detailed Documentation'' More details about this plugin can be found at: https://wikilabs.github.io/editions/tocP More plugins, themes and editions can be found at: https://wikilabs.github.io/ ''Important'' These macros are intended to be "drop in replacement" of the core macros. ... They have the exact same parameter names. Instead of "parent" it still uses "tag" as the first parameter. ''Simple Configuration'' * Enable / Disable the inline "New Child" button ** {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/tocP/toggle-new-child-button}} ''Usage'' ```
